3: Hmm... Will the envoy from Akdilek become a new member of the Gray Ravens?
I'm not sure for how long, but it appears so.
After all, it was a request from the Akdilek leader. It'd be impolite to refuse.
...I'm here on behalf of the Akdilek Commercial Alliance.
Sophia, you may be here as an envoy—
—But we'd like to welcome you to Babylonia as a comrade.
You don't have to be so formal, Hassen.
After all, we transferred you to the Gray Ravens hoping that you can integrate with us by conducting joint operations.
I hope everyone gets along well.
